en-US.emptyLoadShow: No content found for the given filters
en-US.seekNotAllowed: Seeking is not allowed at the end of show
en-US.isResumed: Previous show playback was interrupted. The show is loaded and ready to resume.
en-US.isAutoReloaded: The show reloaded at {time}, to apply recent modifications.
